TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlHeadBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build an control.

block.para: To create a custom control builder for an -derived control, you need to inherit from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed
Public Overrides Function AllowWhitespaceLiterals () As Boolean

Docs.summary: Determines whether the literal white space characters in the control must be processed or ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> method is overridden to always return `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override Type GetChildControlType (string tagName, System.Collections.IDictionary attribs);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Type GetChildControlType(string tagName, class System.Collections.IDictionary attribs) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetChildControlType (tagName As String, attribs As IDictionary) As Type
public: override Type ^ GetChildControlType(System::String ^ tagName, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ attribs);

Docs.param: The tag name of the child control.
An array of attributes contained in the child control.
Docs.summary: Obtains the for the control's child controls.
Docs.returns: The of the specified control's child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHeadBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method returns the control type for child HTML elements represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta> controls. This method returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for all other child controls.
